text:
League 1
Bordeaux - Nantes: which channel, what time?
Nantes moves to Bordeaux this Sunday, November 3 at 15 hours, for the 12th day of Ligue 1. A match that you can find streaming.
03 Nov 2019, 05:00 by Coralie Room



Predrag Rajkoviƒá - ReimsAs every day of the championship, several individualities have distinguished themselves in Ligue 1. Discover the team-type of the weekend of the redaction.Icon Sport



Mohamed Simakan - StrasbourgIcon Sport



Thiago Silva - Paris Saint-GermainIcon Sport



Pablo Martinez - N√ÆmesIcon Sport



Ludovic Baal - BrestIcon Sport



Marco Verratti - Paris Saint-GermainIcon Sport



Paul Lasne - BrestIcon Sport



Angel Di Maria - Paris Saint-GermainIcon Sport



Yusuf Yazƒ±cƒ± - LilleIcon Sport



Mauro Icardi - Paris Saint-GermainIcon Sport



Wissam Ben Yedder - MonacoIcon Sport

Simakan, Di Maria, Yazici, ... The typical team of the weekend in Ligue 1!




Bordeaux receives Nantes at Matmut Atlantique this Sunday, November 3 at 15 hours on behalf of the 12th day of Ligue 1. The Canaries have reassured in the Coupe de la Ligue by winning 8-0 against Paris FC. In the league, the men of Christian Gourcuff are rather struggling. Nantes has 2 consecutive losses against Metz (1-0) and Monaco (0-1)
Same story against Bordeaux who revived in Coupe de la Ligue against Dijon (2-0) after two defeats in the league against Lille (3-0) and Saint-Etienne (0-1).








Bordeaux - Nantes on television
This meeting between Bordeaux and Nantes, which counts for the 12th day of Ligue 1 is broadcast on Bein Sports 1
Bordeaux - Nantes on television




Paulo Sousa, Bordeaux coach + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This meeting between Bordeaux and Nantes, which counts for the 12th day of Ligue 1 is broadcast on Bein Sports 1. The kickoff will be given at 15 hours.
